ðŸ“– Summary: Scraperr is a self-hosted web scraping solution that allows users to extract data from websites using XPath selectors. It provides a user-friendly interface for managing scraping jobs, visualizing results, and exporting data in various formats. Key features include XPath-based extraction, queue management, domain spidering, and media downloads.
